title: OKpays.com
author: OKpays.com
content: OKpays.com is an online crypto and currency exchanger. We have been operating privately for more than a year and have completed over 10,000 orders. We are now open to all users. We offer the following benefits and guarantees: Exchange facility available for as low as $5. All gateway reserves available. More than 100 exchange directions. Best exchange rate compared to other exchangers. Exchange service and servers are protected with SSL. 99% of orders are processed within 24 hours. Affiliate program available. We work 7 days a week, including weekends. Live chat support available. Advanced support ticket system available. Well-trained support managers and finance team. Live chat support available in multiple languages, including English, Russian, French, Spanish, and Turkish. We offer the following online services: Withdrawal of currencies to bank cards such as:  VISA MastercardWithdrawal of currencies from electronic payment systems such as: PayPal Payoneer Perfect Money Payeer WebMoney Wise Skrill OKpays.com exchanger works with the following banks:European banks for SEPA transferUSD bank for Swift transfer Cryptocurrency and stablecoin: BTC BitcoinEthereumLitecoinTether USDTOur automatic and semi-automatic exchange works around the clock, and withdrawals are usually carried out within 15-60 minutes. However, some exchange directions may take between 15 minutes to 24 working hours depending on the payment system. Contacts:Website: OKpays.comEmail: support@okpays.comTelegram: https://t.me/OKpays_supportOnline Live ChatSupport TicketPlease note that we do not accept any orders through social channel. Please do not add contacts by search. But visit our website and then click from the website.

Does the deposit address or account mean that it isn't yours/not controlled by you? Who freezed user funds in this case?You claim exchange will go automatically.

comments.author: OKpays.com
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on August 15, 2023, 12:55:55 PMWell, in conclusion you leave the handling of verification to a third party which is independent from your company, right?Quote from: OKpays.com on August 14, 2023, 11:51:06 PMIt can't be refund or process as It's not credited to our account.I don't really understand the fund that isn't credited to your account, how does that happen? Does the deposit address or account mean that it isn't yours/not controlled by you? Who freezed user funds in this case?You claim exchange will go automatically.@rat03gopoh, No, We conduct verification ourselves. At first our team will verify the documents. in case if require it may be share with the financial institute or crypto exchange or gateway to get release the funds with maintain confidentiality.Suppose if you receive to a licensed crypto gateway (Managed wallet) and if it's frozen for AML checking. then you will need to verify your source of fund. But when user exchanging on our website , primarily they do not require any documents. That's why if any transaction frozen due to AML check then it will require ID proof doc and proof of funds. This mechanism require to comply with regulatory requirement, Money laundering law,  sanctioned requirement.Deposited balance are in our control. Not the wallet addresses. Managed Crypto gateway are always works like this. In that case you may be suggest to use own unmanaged wallet, so it will require us to AML check for every transaction even for $10 or $10K. The AML checking cost is much higher, you may check AMLbot or similar service price.while transaction are AML blockage procedure, it will be like this in the crypto acceptance wallet system: https://prnt.sc/n1IF4ylQ29TO . Also it won't move the fund from the crypto wallet until verify done: https://prnt.sc/CBHYwRWlvLBN . this is a proof that money is not credited to our crypto acceptance wallet and didn't used.All exchange orders will be process as usually normally automatically or semi-automatically unless sender funds frozen for AML check.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: According to the AML/KYC Policy for OKpays.com:Quote5.3. OKpays.com reserves the right to verify a user’s identity on an ongoing basis, especially if their identification information has changed or their activity seems unusual or suspicious. The company may also request up-to-date documents from users, even if they have been authenticated in the past.This item would not be recommended by many users because firstly the right to verify the identity of the user continuously and secondly that you can simply freeze the account if you consider the activity unusual or suspicious? What criteria do you use to determine if user activity is unusual or suspicious?Quote5.4. User identification information will be collected, stored, shared, and protected strictly in accordance with OKpays.com’s Privacy Policy and related rules.Well I don't see this as appropriate at all, "User identification information will be collected, stored, shared, and protected strictly"? How do you share and protect it at the same time???!!! Who will this information be shared with?
